0.1.name: wordpress/global-itms-links
0.1.description: As many bloggers simply copy/paste links from their local iTunes Music Store (iTMS), the reader might land on a page in a foreign language or get an error message from iTunes. Stripping the country codes, the user will always see an English page in the web browser or land on the album page of the local iTMS. This plugin runs without any need to configure it.
